sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Berkeley DB package contains db_archive, db_checkpoint, db_deadlock, db_dump, db_load, db_printlog, db_recover, db_stat, db_upgrade and db_verify.

sect3.title: db_archive
sect3.para: db_archive prints the pathnames of log files that are no longer in use.

sect3.title: db_checkpoint
sect3.para: db_checkpoint is a daemon process used to monitor and checkpoint database logs.

sect3.title: db_deadlock
sect3.para: db_deadlock is used to abort lock requests when deadlocks are detected.

sect3.title: db_dump
sect3.para: db_dump converts database files to a flat file format readable by db_load.

sect3.title: db_load
sect3.para: db_load is used to create database files from flat files created with db_dump.

sect3.title: db_printlog
sect3.para: db_printlog converts database log files to human readable text.

sect3.title: db_recover
sect3.para: db_recover is used to restore a database to a consistent state after a failure.

sect3.title: db_upgrade
sect3.para: db_upgrade is used to upgrade database files to a newer version of Berkeley DB.

sect3.title: db_verify
sect3.para: db_verify is used to run consistency checks on database files.
